name: Jeju Island
description: A scenic volcanic island known for nature and beaches.
address: Jeju Island, Jeju Province, South Korea
detailedDescription: Jeju Island is a volcanic island with breathtaking landscapes, pristine beaches, and lush forests. It is a popular destination for both adventure seekers and those looking to relax. Visitors can enjoy hiking Hallasan, exploring lava tubes, and tasting local seafood. The island also offers cultural experiences like traditional villages and museums. Jeju's slow pace and natural beauty make it ideal for family vacations and nature lovers.

name: Seoul
description: Vibrant city life with rich culture and food.
detailedDescription: Seoul is the dynamic capital of South Korea, offering a perfect blend of modern skyscrapers and historical palaces. The city is known for its vibrant nightlife, shopping districts, and diverse street food. Tourists can explore ancient palaces, enjoy K-pop performances, and relax in Han River parks. It is ideal for friends looking for excitement, culture, and endless exploration in an urban setting.

name: Busan
description: A port city with beautiful beaches and seafood.
detailedDescription: Busan is a coastal city famous for its sandy beaches, seafood markets, and relaxed atmosphere. Visitors can enjoy Haeundae and Gwangalli beaches, fresh seafood at Jagalchi Market, and scenic hikes along coastal trails. The city offers a romantic vibe for couples, as well as vibrant night scenes and cultural landmarks like temples and museums.

name: Gyeongju
description: Historical city with ancient temples and tombs.
address: Gyeongju, North Gyeongsang Province, South Korea
detailedDescription: Gyeongju is often referred to as a 'museum without walls' due to its rich historical heritage. It was once the capital of the ancient Silla Kingdom, and visitors can explore Bulguksa Temple, Seokguram Grotto, and ancient burial mounds. It is perfect for educational family trips and those interested in Korean history and architecture.

name: Incheon
description: Modern city near the capital with coastal views.
detailedDescription: Incheon is a gateway city located west of Seoul, known for its international airport and coastal charm. The city blends modern infrastructure with coastal attractions like Songdo Central Park and Wolmido Island. It’s a great choice for solo travelers looking for a quick getaway, harbor views, and a taste of Korea’s city life outside Seoul.
